Medium: Three soft ground etchings (one with aquatint and one with etching); one lithograph (cover); twenty-one line block reproductions after drawings (eighteen with pochoir); and fourteen line block reproductions (tailpiece and initials, including one duplicate)
Dimensions:
page  9 7/16 x 7 1/2" (24 x 19 cm)
Prints:  various dimensions.
Title: La brebis galante
